label: verse_missing_emails_0_1
title: Emails from a Certain Period are Missing on the Cloud
html:
Emails from a Certain Period are Missing on the Cloud

If the emails are visible in All Documents view but not in Inbox or Folders, the mail template design is corrupted. To fix this issue, you 'll need to verify if the issue is on the server copy or local copy of your mail.

If the issue is on the server copy of your email, contact Help Desk to get a ticket transferred to the support team for mail template replacement. Template replacement on the server copy of your mail can only be done by a server administrator after your mail has moved to the cloud.

If the issue is on the local copy of your email, and the server copy is unaffected by this issue,then try to replace the template on your local copy.Refer to Apply a Design Template to your Local Replica.

If replacing the template does not fix the issue, then create a new local copy , which will inherit the template from the fully functional copy of your mail on the server.

label: c_slm_trblsht_reinstall_newcomp_0
title: Reinstall Licensed Application on New Computer
html:
Reinstall Licensed Application on New Computer

If you receive a new computer to replace your old one, use the same software applications. In most cases, you install the software on your new computer using the same method you used on your old computer.

If your new computer has a different operating system, such as going from a Windows machine to a Mac, verify that the software that you are entitled to is available for your new operating system.

If not, you might have to request a new license for a different product or version. See Install Software License List to determine which licensed applications you are entitled to install.

If the product is listed , see Software License Management for installation information for entitled users .In most cases, you install from an App Store. If you receive entitlement errors and want to resolve it, refer to Entitlement Error

If the product isn't listed , and you previously purchased a license via Software License team, forward your proof of purchase email to proof@xxx.com .In a few days you will receive an email indicating entitlement to install.

label: jobs_do_not_print_0_1_2_3_4_5_6_7
title: Jobs Do Not Print
html:
Jobs Do Not Print

Print Job Is Too Large

Allow the printer a few minutes to print. If the file is very large,it can take longer for it to start printing. You may try break the job into multiple ones.

The File Name Contains Characters the Printer Can't Recognize

Check the name of the file you 're printing and make sure it doesn't contain special characters. This is a known issue that the print support team is working on. Until this is resolved, use these work-arounds.

If you are at the printer, rename the job in your job list and then restart printing.

From your computer, remove the special charactors from the file name or email subject line and print.

label: special_emergency_request
title: Create a Special Device Request
html:
Create a Special Device Request

If your device is broken or not working well, contact support and have a representative analyze the device status. If a replacement is required,a ticket is opened so you can use it to request a new device from the IT Desk Page.

If your device has been lost or stolen, refer to My Device was Lost or Stolen.

To request replacement on IT Desk Page, you must complete information required in the form and submit the request

For broken/lost/stolen devices, IT Desk sends the best device available in inventory or a new one, if the stock quantities allow.

Note : You can submit an emergency request for another user if their computer is broken or not functional.

label: hw_support_other_0
title: My Apple Device Isn't Covered or Has Accidental Damage
html:
My Apple Device Isn't Covered or Has Accidental Damage

You may followthese steps to get a replacement device based on the type of device and your primary work location. These instructions apply in either of the following situations:

  • The AppleCare and/or AppleCare for Enterprise ACE coverage on your WORKSYSTEM - owned Apple device has expired.
  • The WORKSYSTEM - owned Apple device hardware problem was caused by accidental damage, such as spilling a liquid on the device or dropping it.

You must adhere to WORKSYSTEM's guidelines if you choose to take your WORKSYSTEM - owned Apple device to an Apple Store or an Apple Authorized Service Provider for repair.

If you take your WORKSYSTEM - owned device in for repair and it falls outside of the warranty coverage, WORKSYSTEM doesn't reimburse you for any charges incurred.

Also, the Apple Store or Apple Service Provider doesn't offer a loaner if the store sends your device off for repair.

If you need clarification, contact support.

label: network
title: Connect to the WORKSYSTEM Network
html:
Connect to the WORKSYSTEM Network

How you connect to the WORKSYSTEM network depends on the location you connect from at an WORKSYSTEM site or remotely.

Wireless at an WORKSYSTEM Location

For any WORKSYSTEM employee who needs to connect at an WORKSYSTEM location, refer to Connect to the WORKSYSTEM Wireless Network.

If wireless is not available at the WORKSYSTEM location, you will need to use an Ethernet adapter to connect via an Ethernet cable. Refer to Mac Accessories Adapters for more information about adapters for Mac computers .

Connect from a Remote Location

If you need to connect to the WORKSYSTEM network from outside an WORKSYSTEM location such as home and hotel, you will use a Virtual Private Network VPN. Refer to Set Up a VPN.

label: overview
title: Requirements for Windows Virtualization
html:
Requirements for Windows Virtualization

If you need to run a Windows operating system on a Mac ,you can use a Windows Virtualization bundle available from the WORKSYSTEM App Store.

The apps for this bundle only display in the WORKSYSTEM App Store if you are signed in and have the required licenses.

Other VM applications, such as Parallels and VirtualBox , run on macOS , but aren't supported by WORKSYSTEM . If you choose to run an unsupported VM ,you must use a version of Windows 10 that is fully licensed for use at WORKSYSTEM .

Important : If you already have VMware Professional Fusion 8 and a Windows 7 VM on your Mac , you can continue to use your Windows 7 VM until WORKSYSTEM ends Windows 7 support at the end of 2019.

To update to Fusion 11 and Windows 10 VM ,request licenses as indicated below.

label: mail_id_help_comp_0_1
title: Get Help with the Identity Provisioning Service
html:
Get Help with the Identity Provisioning Service

If you experience an issue logging in to the Onboarding Service 's Admin Console, check the support and maintenance page to determine if the service is down for maintenance

Also, check the WORKSYSTEM Outages page to determine if there 's an unplanned outage posted .

If the service is down for maintenance or an outage, try your request after the posted end time.

If this isn't the case or not the issue you 're experiencing ,contact support using the steps below for all other mail ID related issues .

label: unable_to_connect_0_1_2_3_4_5_6_7_8_9_10_11_12
title: Connection Errors
html:
Connection Errors

If you attempt to connect to the Network Client and receive the following error: "VPN server list could not be obtained from the server":

Take the following steps:

  1. Confirm that you entered the correct account and user ID.
  2. Try configuration with SSL protocol with this SSL Set Up Instruction. If unsuccessful, uninstall and reinstall the Network Client.
  3. Visit any external website to verify that the internet connection functions properly. If the internet isn't working, reset all devices involved in your home network connection and reboot your computer.
  4. If Network Client still can't connect, remove the saved password and try connecting after reentering it.
  5. If the error persists, make sure your password doesn't contain any special characters at the beginning or end of it. If it does, try resetting a new password.

If the above steps don’t work, there is another possible explanation: incorrect tokenization. Refer to this page to fix incorrect tokenization.

label: overview_webex_meetings_comp
title: Online Meeting
html:
Online Meeting

Your Personal Meeting Room (PMR) is always available and starts when you click the Start Meeting button in the WORKSYSTEM desktop application.

Also,you can schedule a meeting with extra parameters, such as a password and a URL specific to the meeting Use this type of meeting if you expect a large number of attendees or discuss confidential material.

Refer to WORKSYSTEM Meeting Resources , if you are looking for more training videos and presentations

For details on how to navigate and run a meeting, follow this link for tutorials on Managing your WORKSYSTEM Meeting. You may be prompted for choosing a meeting type. If you don’t know which one to choose, refer to this link for a description of meting types.
